I should now identify which cells are relevant to this conclusion. For each row, the columns "austin", "opponent's venue", and "neutral site" contain the scores for different game locations against each team. So I'll note these columns across all rows as they support the claim that scores vary by location per opponent.
</think>

The table shows Texas Longhorns women's basketball games against various teams, with scores recorded at Austin, opponents' venues, and neutral sites for each team.
